posts.title: 英一词组
posts.text: keep abreast of 跟上 come to 谈到 show up 出现 act on 对 ……起作用/产生影响 center on 围绕、集中于 comment on 对……作出评论 in return for 作为对……的回报 in reply to 作为对……的答复 in reference to 关于 in response to 作为对……的反应 but rather 而是 or else 否则，要不然 be subject to易遭受 for the sake of 因为……的缘故 point to 指出，指明 amount to 总计，等于 in general 普遍地 on average 平均起来 by contrast 相反地 at length 最后，终于 in case 假使，万一 in essence 本质上 as yet 到目前为止 refer to 指的是 do without 没有也可以 not anymore不再 seem to 似乎，好像 belt-tightening 节衣缩食 bite her nails 手足无措 grow out of 改掉

posts.title: 英一单词
posts.text: attribute contribute concern corporation punishment commit crime accent criminal status penalize juvenile discard coincidence amount delinquency suggest misdeed essence partition inflict contrast middle-class socioeconomic athlete predecessor entrepreneur sake symptom pervasive intellectualism acquire independently counterbalance reform distaste vulnerable exploitation defend civil resent privilege democracy urge noble elitism native suppress rigorous unnatural restraint preserve goodness activate terminate identical complementary regular evolve grip promise vertex matrix latter adequate tentative criticism tentative interaction assimilation cooperation consultation immune sensitive resistant subject rising gainful discontent obtain household common frustration offensive drug probability undertake supervision contrarily consequently simultaneously similarly heritage concept assessable negligible identifiable incredible restriction allocation availability incidence awareness exposure provided supposing since agent interactive property counsel stumble promising narrow drawback eliminate possibility implicit abreast broaden compensation advisory reminder vice president tempt reserve worthwhile negotiate raise indispensable unfairness fairly insidious form thrive boom against alphabet over evenly conspicuous prejudice respectively strike subtle infant qualification yet humiliation ballot plough impatient doze humiliate puzzle campaign surname manicurist desperate bite nail longtime blame downscaling suburban folk indicator do without admission pace mildly prospect modest belt tight fortune steady dreadful steady bonus predominantly broker bay frenzied overbidding seem to not anymore upside sustained cheer interest panicked venture precede sake symptom pursue turbo multi split violet violent violate rectangle expert export import pursue pursuit derive desire nation notion temper temple vest vase trick track truck desire derive fame fume blame lame directory dictionary form formal former formula format inform formation explode session duplicate oral neural accuracy regression annotation

posts.title: 机器学习
posts.text: py1.注意和js一样不用加分号不用加变量定义不用加数据类型 2.定义一个函数 def 函数名（参数列表）: 函数体 3.if用法 if 判断条件： 执行语句…… else： 执行语句…… 4.print print()打印 机器学习import 导入，进口，几个package, as 后跟着别名1.numpy 用来实现向量，矩阵计算2.padas 用来导入csv文件 padas.read_csv('./文件名.csv') 或者 padas.read_csv('文件名.csv') 文件名.csv和当前程序放在一起3.matplotlib 用来实现数据可视化 plt是别名plt.scatter(x,y) 散播图plt.show() 放出图 4.sklearn 里有数据集 dataset from sklearn.datasets import load_iris from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split from sklearn import linear_model 5.数据集分为训练集和测试集，一条数据分为特征值和目标值6.任务分回归和分类，根据目标值是连续值还是离散值来判断7.第一个机器学习算法是线性回归算法
